page.title: 06Later, the same Day
page.content: Dad began bleaching the woodwork (he's a DIY fanatic,) and I fed Joey. I then phoned my mum and brother. She told me her nursing homework was hell, and her Doberman puppies had destroyed everything in sight. Henry talked about his computer and his girlfriend Catherine. At 5pm I watched the News, but it was followed by 'Wonder Woman', so I tried the other channels. However, nothing appealed to me so I put on 'Wham's Make it Big', & sat back. Dad ruined the atmosphere by using his electric sander, whereupon Joey leapt onto my lap and froze. Later, I replaced the LP and gazed at the piscture of George Michael on the sleeve. I then had coffee, watched TV until ll.30; I enjoyed 'Dynasty' After washing and changing, I read a Horror book from my collection. At l2.30 I was asleep.
